<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_needit</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>GetAuthToken</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    sm.setEndpoint("https://dev109517.service-now.com/oauth_token.do");
    //sm.setHttpMethod("POST");
    sm.setRequestHeader("Accept", "Application/json");
	sm.setQueryParameter("request","POST");
    sm.setQueryParameter("grant_type", "password");
    sm.setQueryParameter("client_id", "72cbca92d0ce51102f4a294e518f7056");
    sm.setQueryParameter("client_secret", "qm~v:o.hN?");
    sm.setQueryParameter("username", "OAuthIncidentUser");
    sm.setQueryParameter("password", "9!H)y6+0oq)}ykh?ZIk5UY_(j[dF*T1Kf}n1zPeThj6nUKWv!FUAqYE0j_0N]UY<w.tgKfdn_.iMfjz2?dk;Ie@(?)EYkZQ{f43q");
	
    var response = sm.execute();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    gs.info(responseBody);
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-22 17:02:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c1f09792978a9110a54377d71153af91</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetAuthToken</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c1f09792978a9110a54377d71153af91</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-22 17:08:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c1f09792978a9110a54377d71153af91"/></record_update>
